alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Murray; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:28AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilmer, southeastern Murray, northwestern Union and Fannin Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 328 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Copperhill to near Cherry Log to Tails Creek, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ellijay, Blue Ridge, East Ellijay, Morganton, Hemp, Tails Creek, Margret, Higdon, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Loving, Jones Creek, Epworth, Dial, Pisgah, Mineral Bluff, Cherry Log, Mountaintown, and Colwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
